use.flag: Enable the use of the `semigroups` package. Disabling this is an unsupported configuration, but it may be useful for accelerating builds in sandboxes for expert users.
Enable the use of of the `statevar` package. Disabling this is an unsupported configuration, but it may be useful for accelerating builds in sandboxes for expert users.
Enable the use of the `tagged` package. Disabling this is an unsupported configuration, but it may be useful for accelerating builds in sandboxes for expert users.
